name: stackgazer
description: A single-page app for viewing Go stack traces

scripts.build: npm run build:base && node scripts/inline-worker.cjs && node scripts/bundle.cjs
scripts.build:base: rm -rf dist coverage && esbuild src/ui/index.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --sourcemap --external:jszip && cp src/ui/index.html src/ui/styles.css dist/ && esbuild node_modules/jszip/dist/jszip.min.js --outfile=dist/jszip.js --format=esm
scripts.build:bundle: npm run build:base && esbuild src/ui/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/app-bundle.js --format=iife --global-name=StackGazer --footer:js="window.StackTraceApp = StackGazer.StackTraceApp;" && node scripts/bundle.cjs
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build:inline && npx tsc test/parser.test.ts --outDir dist --module ES2020 --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --types node && c8 --reporter=text --reporter=html node dist/parser.test.js
